definitions.definition: A centigrade temperature scale having the freezing point of water defined as 0째 and its boiling point defined as 100째 at standard atmospheric pressure. Although formally known as the Celsius scale since 1948, centigrade is still the more commonly found term.
A single degree on this scale.
A unit of angle equal to the hundredth part of a quadrant. Its symbol is gon .

main_definition: ( uncountable ) A centigrade temperature scale having the freezing point of water defined as 0째 and its boiling point defined as 100째 at standard atmospheric pressure. Although formally known as the Celsius scale since 1948, centigrade is still the more commonly found term.
secondary_definitions: ( countable , dated ) A single degree on this scale.
( countable ) A unit of angle equal to the hundredth part of a quadrant. Its symbol is gon .
